item.title: How to convert images to gif
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: install imagemagick through homebrew $ brew install imagemagick convert pngs to gif with 2 second per frame $ convert -delay 200 *.png converted.gif

item.title: Programming Concept
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Links leesei’s choice Naming What can I learn right now in just 10 minutes that could be useful for the rest of my programming career? Programming Principal reference Links How to make your code self-documenting? | CodeUtopia Separation of concerns - Wikipedia Garbage in, garbage out - Wikiwand leesei’s choice Naming 寫出黎就要俾名，俾名啲concept 就清楚，code 亦自然清楚 What can I learn right now in just 10 minutes that could be useful for the rest of my programming career?
